title: Welcome to mmap.it!
text:
## What is mmap

mmap\.it is a personal knowledge base built for speed and accessibility. It's composed of two parts:
* **Editor:** an inline markdown editor that lets you quickly record anything from code snippets to complex tutorials.
* **Search:** Everything you create with mmap is indexed so you can instantly search.


## How to use mmap      

mmap\.it\(\) is operated entirely by keyboard shortcuts, so you can access it without interrupting your current workflow.
| **Operation** | **Shortcut** |
|:--- |:--- |
| Toggle Editor | CMD \+ Option \+ C |
| Toggle Search | CTRL \+ Space |
| Editor Save | CMD \+ S |
| Navigate Search | Up & Down Arrows |
| Search Select | Enter |
| Delete From Search | CMD \+ d |
